home_title: Coffee Shop and Restaurant in Panama
home_description: Discover our cafe-restaurant in Panama. Home cooking, exceptional coffee, craft cocktails. Lunches, sandwiches, burgers and protein bowls with local ingredients. Cozy atmosphere.
¡Ven a complacer tu paladar con un varia: Come and please your palate with a varied menu of what you like the most!
¡Somos Más que un Coffee Shop!: We’re more than just a Coffee Shop!
about_text_1: opens its door in 2015 as a 100% Panamanian coffee shop. Thanks to the acceptance of our clients, in a short time Tosto Coffee became a meeting point for friends, families and couples.
about_text_2: Tosto Coffee is so much more than a Coffee Shop.  In our stores, you will find a varied menu, designed to please your palate at breakfast, lunch and dinner time.
about_text_4: Our coffee is proudly Panamanian and we have developed our mixes in alliance with local farms, guaranteeing quality in every cup
about_text_6: At Tosto Coffee we want you to have the best time; for that, we have designed our stores with a relaxing, cozy, cheerful and familiar atmosphere.  We have contemporary music and free internet
about_text_7:
Special moments
and the best company!
